price: 99. Ba oyo wana nde Allah na mawa naye akoki kolimbisa bango. Mpe Allah azali na mawa atonda bolimbisi.
arabic: فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ عَسَى ٱللَّهُ أَن يَعۡفُوَ عَنۡهُمۡۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَفُوًّا غَفُورٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: fa-ulāika ʿasā al-lahu an yaʿfuwa ʿanhum wakāna al-lahu ʿafuwwan ghafūran
